title: Collaborating on Interoperability to Achieve a Single Market

Processing the company knowledge in one language inside and only when it hits a target market they were translating it.
Now they are confronted with content which is multilingual and they need to understand.
My statement is that there's no single market without Inter ability and the single market is a big bus word, and if you think about it, I know many startups.
